properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued January 18 at 9:55AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Heavy
Freezing Spray Warning, which is in effect from 6 PM this evening
to noon CST Sunday.

* WINDS...West gales to 45 kt.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 11 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 14 ft.

* ICE ACCUMULATIONS...Strong winds and air temperatures in the
teens will result in a risk for heavy freezing spray.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occurring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

A Heavy Freezing Spray Warning means heavy freezing spray is
expected to rapidly accumulate on vessels. These conditions can
be extremely hazardous to navigation. It is recommended that
mariners not trained to operate in these conditions or vessels
not properly equipped to do so...remain in port or avoid the
warning area.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY
